long_description: Designed for overnight travelers who pack light, the REI Sport Beast Travel Pack combines a comfortable pack harness with laptop storage and organization features. Pack is sized to fit into most airline overhead bins and underseat spaces. Shoulder harness and waistbelt are contoured to provide a comfortable fit. Zippered panel opening offers easy access to pack contents; 2 interior pockets and compression straps help keep things neatly organized. Front has a vertical pocket with a hidden zipper; design offers easy swing-around access while bag rests on one shoulder. A soft neoprene sleeve inside the pack can hold a laptop up to 15.6". Padded, fleece-lined side pocket can stow sunglasses or electronic devices. The Sport Beast daypack also has a side pocket that's sized to hold a 1-liter bottle. Shoulder strap's zippered stretch pocket is handy for stowing a phone. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
